players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out."
Bob: "I am innocent! Charlie is lying about being the detective to frame me. Why would he investigate me randomly on night one with no reason? That makes no sense for a real detective."
Bob: "Alice, Charlie is lying. He can't be detective because I am the real detective and investigated him last night - he's mafia. Vote Charlie to save town!"
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is mafia. My investigation result is clear. Don't believe his lies."
You: "I am the detective and investigated Bob last night. I found evidence of mafia involvement. Charlie is innocent, and we should vote Bob out."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
